Package space.sunqian.common.base.chars

Class CharsBuilder

java.lang.Object
java.io.Writer
space.sunqian.common.base.chars.CharsBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable, CharSequence
public class CharsBuilder extends Writer implements CharSequence
CharsBuilder is used to build char arrays and their derived objects by appending char data. It is similar to CharArrayWriter, provides compatible methods, but is not thread-safe. This class is also the subtype of the Writer and CharSequence, but the close() method has no effect.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets this builder, the appended data will be discarded.

      This method doesn't guarantee releasing the allocated space for the appended data. To trim and release the unused space, use trim().

    • trim

      public void trim()
      Trims and releases the allocated but unused space.
